item.title: Microbes and macro-invertebrates show parallel β-diversity but contrasting α-diversity patterns in a marine natural experiment
item.description: Related materials UC Merced Newsroom piece Our new paper shows that #marine β-#diversity patterns are positively correlated among organisms as different as #microbes and #macro-organisms Rapacciuolo et al #ProcB @RSocPublishing @MNDlab @LMSchiebelhut https://t.co/TawV2c4KaN pic.twitter.com/MAQBNo147c — Gio Rapacciuolo (@giorapac) October 9, 2019
